website_summaries.verdict: An innovative set of shopping bags with a design that focuses on streamlining the entire shopping process from start to finish. Quality bags with everything you need to stay organized.
pros: Set of 4 fits most shopping carts and includes 1 insulated bag to keep perishables fresh
Comes with extra compartments for eggs, wine, or other breakables
Removable rods can be used to keep bags upright
Heavy-duty construction holds up to 50 lbs
cons: Rods are somewhat long and can make it awkward to navigate grocery store traffic, but they are also removable

customer_reviews.title: four stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. After second use, the seams are starting to tear where the top bar is. Disappointing. Update: minutes after posting my review, Lotus contacted me and after verifying via picture where the velcro came loose from the top of the bag, they offered to send me a new set of bags. Much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: amber randall

customer_reviews.title: This Bag Is SUPER!!!! Love IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my Lotus Trolley Bag so fast and took it out on its maiden voyage to Giant! It worked like a charm! Made my shopping so easy and I was able to keep all my things organized for easy check out and unloading at home! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to carry when full
customer_reviews.text: Works well but these bags are too large so the cashiers tend to overfill them, making them extremely heavy. I would have been happier buying two sets, for a total of eight bags if they were smaller which would make them much more easy to carry. I'm a pretty strong woman but I have to struggle carrying these in after a shopping trip, (a flight of stairs would be painful). For a smaller shopping trip they're just too big. So bottom line, I think these are high quality but I suggest the manufacturer make these smaller and sell them in a pack of 6-8 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Really cool bags! Great quality and happy to see they ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool bags! Great quality and happy to see they are not cheaply made. Great colors and absolutely love the cooler bag and the egg holder. Three people at the grocery store stopped me today to ask where I got the bags from. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We don't go shopping without them. Really.
customer_reviews.text: We are the biggest dorks for using these in the grocery store. I won't give them up. As the years go by we are expected to do the cashier and bagger's jobs now so get these bags and make your new career easier. Works on any normal grocery cart. Not so good on the huge grocery carts from our Super Grocery Stores or the Box Warehouse places. They do work, just not as well. I put in longer dowel rods for $7 at big box hardware store. Now they work at the C***** and S*** warehouse stores. Really, this is a great invention.
customer_reviews.author: Handygal

customer_reviews.title: godsend
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for. It fits all the shopping carts, and you can detach them and take only 1-2 of the bags if you are shopping smaller quantities. I've been using it for a few days now and I love it. I used to have bunch of different bags in my trunk, and it was very messy. With Lotus Bags I can finally get rid of all the other bags, and have these sitting nice and pretty in the trunk. The cooler bag is specially awesome to keep the items cool while shopping to transporting them home. The bags look very well made and sturdy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rossi

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous. They are especially convenient if your grocery store, like ours, is offering hand held devices to scan items as you go. We scan our groceries and pack them as we move thru the store then check out at the self- check out lane without having to unpack the bags. These trolley bags make it an even easier task. We get comments all through the store about how cool they are but for us the convenience and organization of these bags as opposed to bunches of mismatched smaller bags is what we really like. They are neat to store in your car and make shopping easier and quicker and help make unloading the groceries also easier and quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Made in China.
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Huge and they are always on the way. Not practical at all. It doesn't make the shopping experience any better. I wonder how it is that these brand has supposedly 9 patents pending in different countries when the Chinese already have it?... There are no numbers anywhere so... I'm just saying... Also they are made in China and the quality is bad, the stitches might be good but the material is pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Margoz

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the Butt
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these until I went to actually use them. They were a pain in the butt. Unwieldy, ill fitting, and totally impractical in practice. I tried with a little shopping trip and with a big one, and I found myself wasting a ton of time adjusting, positioning, planning, etc. regardless of the situation. I also tried using them to organize during the trip, and keeping them tucked away until the end. It just wasn’t working for me any which way. One plus was the extremely long return window. I still missed it by procrastinating, unfortunately, but I can’t complain since I was given way more than enough time to get my act together.
customer_reviews.author: Seoh

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these bags for myself and my Mom. We love them. I added a picture of my bags in a Walmart shopping cart. They fit perfect. I have used them at BJ's (equivalent to Costco or Sam's club) the bags only fit at the top of the bigger baskets but I'm not too worried about that. I just fill them after I ring the items up and the bags stand up by themselves. The velcro is sturdy. I store them in the back of my SUV. I absolutely love having these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy These!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever! They are too big for regular carts and bulk store carts. The arms stick out entirely too far and hit people!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these bags! I can’t speak to their longevity as I haven’t had them long, but they seem well made. They are easy to use and both the person bagging my groceries and the cashier commented on the bags. The person bagging the groceries was surprised with how easy they were for him to use. I love that there’s an insulated bag and the bags all have plenty of space for items and are easy to carry in from the car. So far I’m really pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fantastic! They are big enough to hold at least 2 weeks groceries for a small household. (I live alone and I can shop for the month with just these bags. It takes some practice getting fast at rebagging stuff after it's scanned but it only takes 2 trips max to carry everything inside. They are durable and easy to fold back together. The only notable critique I have is that they are a little to talk for the depth of a standard US cart but that just means you have to be careful to separate each bag's bottom from the bag next to it. Overall: Wonderful purchase, very happy, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perea

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year of use...
customer_reviews.text: I love the wood dowel and how the bags fit into the cart. After using these for a year, found these to be too large and cumbersome when the bags are filled over halfway. If these bags were smaller or there were another configuration it would work better. Too heavy, too bulky to fit, lift and transport once they are 1/2 or 2/3 full depending on items. The egg holder doesn't really fit a dozen easily - and I don't trust it to protect eggs. The mesh has begun to fray.
customer_reviews.author: ammie p.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very often that I feel compelled to write a review when there’s already so many amazing reviews..but that’s just how much I love these bags! They make check out a breeze, you can fit a huge cart of groceries in the 4 bags (with room to spare!), load them in your car quickly and I can usually get all 4 bags into the house in one trip! The best part? You’re helping our planet by using these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survey says: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure whether these were worth the price. But they are! I can bag my groceries so much easier now. And when I don't need all the bags I just pull out the wood rod and the bag still stands upright when filling it! I also have a teen with autism that I am trying to teach how to shop. Well, the bag situation in the store was a problem for him so these bags really help. These shopping bags look good, are functional, and worth every penny. Probably one of my favorite amazon purchases ever :-)
customer_reviews.author: DebraJ

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time at my local grocery store as I also scan ahead of checking out. It works fantastic! I am so glad I bought these. They are very spacious and well designed. Very durable! I highly recommend these for anyone who likes to reuse shopping bags or does their own self check out! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: njz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the strap the Velcro unraveled from the holding strap on bags. But a small factor of how amazing theses are! I can easily sew it back on at home. I was flocked at the store and asked where I got these. They couldn’t believe the quality of them and the price. With Oregon’s new no plastic bag law, these are a must!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa F.

customer_reviews.title: My new grocery shopping must-have
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! My grocery store just added a feature to their app that lets you scan your items as you put them in your cart, and then just has an employee verify them quickly at the register when you go to pay. These bags seem tailor-made for the process. They fit the carts perfectly, I load them as I shop, and then I pay and leave without even having to unload the bags. It's like grocery shopping from the future! These hold a ton and seem sturdy, fold up neatly when I'm not using them, and don't take up too much of my trunk space. I'd give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: This is a top notch of high quality product. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a top notch of high quality product. The product came in the mail on time and well protected. Actually in my opinion this product has multiple uses other than just carrying groceries. It has a very stylish look and very light that anyone can carry it. I'm ordering a few more for the family and some as gifts. THANKS H.A.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very easy to use (once you get the hang of it)
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! To be honest it took a couple of trips to get the hang of since the store was so quick to just bag my groceries but once the official ban of plastic bags went into effect it was so much easier. The bags are amazing quality and hold a lot! I even took the sticks out of the blue one and used it while clothes shopping at the mall. Worth the money and glad I purchased them and ready for the plastic bag ban. The biggest issue I have is to remember to bring in the store! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Henry  J Bick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for those grocery trips where you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for those grocery trips where you want to be organized. Sitting more comfortably on a larger cart we were out of check out in no time! Love the insulated option here. Fold up and go!
customer_reviews.author: rachel v. ivey

customer_reviews.title: sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these bags for about a year and a half. I really like them. They’re huge and super sturdy. I’ve even gotten two packs of 12 cans of pop inside the purple bag and no rips or anything!!! I got them originally because I had to go up so many stairs in my apartment but now even after moving I still only use them. I did get rid of those poles because I thought they got in the way, but they’re great bags. I’ve had a lot of people compliment them and ask where I got them from. I have currently started shopping at aldi and they’re amazing for that
customer_reviews.author: Carolina C.

customer_reviews.title: Leave them in the car!
customer_reviews.text: - I love these bags! I love the insulated bag for getting those frozen items home. - I like that they are different sizes. I love the colors. - They are sturdy and well-made. However, they don't work so well when you go to those bulk stores with the huge carts. - Be mindful of the weight that you are putting into the bags unless you're a body builder. - Make sure you have them WITH you! Put them back into your car after you unload them. - I love them so much that I bought a set for my mother-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: daboop

customer_reviews.title: We use these for everything
customer_reviews.text: Love these things - we use them for everything. This is the third time I have ordered them. I do wish they made a size for the larger carts you find at the warehouse stores like Costco or Sams but that doesn't stop us from using them. The top that holds the plastic bars in place tends to come undone at the seam but we still use them for pretty much every trip.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah James

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and sturdy made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my SIL. I am very happy with how sturdy they are! I’m glad i purchased this brand as they are great quality and the Velcro is strong and sewn on well. The design of them is well thought out. She’s used them for a couple months and they are holding up great. She loved the insulated bag for cold or hot items as well as there pockets for a carton of eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lofts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! Using them makes my grocery shopping easier. I don't have 12 bags to carry inside anymore. I also get lots of compliments about them and many ask where I purchased them. I also feel like I am doing just a little bit more to help our environment. I will be purchasing more as gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to load and unload!
customer_reviews.text: I love these after I finally figured out how to use them! (LOL) - The 1st trip out was so embarrassing; I didn't have them in my cart correctly - my stupidity! Once I figured out you put the rods inside the cart and run them through the slats in the cart , they worked great. After a few trips to the grocery store, I finally got very comfortable with them. They are a wonderful product - Yes, I'd highly recommend them. And, great for the environment as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment turned into an AWESOME experience!
customer_reviews.text: I originally posted a 1 star review due to my experience with a defective product. However this company has FANTASTIC customer service. Jen allowed me to retry the item and I am so glad that she did. I am excited to change my review from 1 star to 5 STARS! The bags fit great across the cart and made it easy to sort as I shopped. Also the size of the bags allowed me to fit all of my groceries with no problems. The freezer bag is also a super bonus! I am looking forward to trying the reusable produce bags. Great product - will definitely recommend! Thank you again to Jen!
customer_reviews.author: Ronna duarte

customer_reviews.title: Made my life easy
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommended this product. It made my life easy especially during the winter that I don't need to carry the groceries in the plastic bags going back and fort to the car. Warning: this may fit in a regular cart like shoprite, stop shop, walmart but its too small for cosco cart coz i think cosco has bigger cart. I live in NJ so I don't know in other state. I'm happy with this. Thank you🥰
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION... I have purchased countless number of ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECTION...I have purchased countless number of "bag systems" and my journey has ended with the Lotus Trolley Bag. I have two of them so I can load my groceries in one set, then when I get to check out, I put my second set in an empty cart. I then lift the filled bag onto the checkout counter and return it to the same color empty bag. My back doesn't have to tense up unloading the cart one item at a time:) We live in a small town and everywhere I go people ask me where I got my bags. I'm proud to be known as "the bag lady":)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these but they don’t fit in shopping carts (not wide enough) and they are difficult to use as regular bags ... bummed
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Weakley

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: Well we have not use the product yet but it really looks nice when we took it out of the box seems like a great idea we hope it holds up we won't be using it until the plastic ban goes into effect in New York City March 1st
customer_reviews.author: sephira

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments on this every time we use them. It's so much easier to carry groceries into the house, and we don't have a ton of empty plastic bags after a shopping trip! If I could change anything about these, it would be to have some sort of sturdy bottom base you could insert into the mesh bags. It would just make it easier to stack and transfer to the car. Overall we LOVE these bags and would buy them all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea - check your grocery store carts
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really good idea. The only problem in my area is there are no grocery carts that don't have that sort of upper shelf in the big part of the cart or they are those little tiny ones. Either way they are too small for the product to be used properly. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Dale Tydd-Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Might not hold a really big grocery purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. BUT, the cart must be empty or partially in order to spread the bags across for bagging. I am trying to now shop at stores where I might be able to scan my purchases and place them directly into the opened spread out bags before checking out, or going to stores that are ok with me placing these bags in their bagging areas so that the "weight" doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Energy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Useful and nice
customer_reviews.text: My cart became very easy to be unloaded. Every product has its bag and will be easy to store at home. The cons is the sturdiness, because of the mesh you can store too much weight. Should be better improving the fabric using a solid one.
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags because I thought they would be handy for grocery shopping. They are very pretty and excellent quality and construction. They have convenient pockets, belts to hold liquids upright and Velcro closures to keep bags neat and tidy. My only complaint is the bars which hook them on to shopping carts. They are very long, much wider than any grocery cart I have used. This makes them a bit clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! They roll up and store perfect with one handle. They fit on your shopping carts great, hold a lot, with lots of weight. The egg baskets are great for fragile items, and the insulated bag is AMAZING. The insulated bag has a Velcro close on it to keep it cool also. All these bags detach with velcrl for easy loading. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present for my mom. Let me just tell you for the first month she had them i swear everytime we talked(which is almost everyday lol) she told me how much she loved them. Now recently she had to have knee surgery and guess what, now my dad is doing the grocery shopping. And killing it with these bags, even he loves them. Best bags on the market by far, they are superrrr durable and from the insulated bag to the wine pockets theyve thought of everything! Planning to purchase my own set very sooon!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, sturdy, easy to load and unload.  Highly recommend them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these bags, he says they make bringing in the groceries much easier! Very easy to put in the cart, load and unload. They are so sturdy and love having the cooler bag. Highly recommend these bags! I bought some other bags and the handles broke the first time I used them - total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags!! Genius idea!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! These are amazing!!! I just started Shipt shopping and everyone comments on these and how awesome they are!!! I also bought a 7.75 hook for bags, I think they should add that on to lotus shopping bag. No kidding, this 59 yo woman can tote $250 worth of groceries in one swoop!! AND a freezer one to boot..... just love them!
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome!!! I do Shop and Scan at my local grocery store and these make it even better than reusable totes because they stay open and art much easier to fill as I go!! I’m so glad I did purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rolf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I originally saw these in the supermarket and ended up buying them on Amazon. They're very cool bags hold a lot very strong I'm nice to hang over the cart. What is a freezer bag. It's amazing how well they hold up they don't even look dirty and I've had them for a while
customer_reviews.author: Sharon White/Smith

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these great for the environment, but they make shopping so much more convenient! Only having to load & unload 4 bags instead of 40 was great. Also love the benefit of having all my cold items in the same insulated bag. I've already recommended these to my co-workers & all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great bags.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Only down side is when my child is in the seat we dont have access to the purple bag as much so we need to remember to full that one first. Other down side is we get stopped at least twice at the store every time we go by people asking where we got them! They work great and have been really durable with how much we put into each bag. Really convenient with scan bag and go!
customer_reviews.author: CocoLoco

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, but you may need to purchase additional dowel rods for these to work, as some stores have larger/wider shopping carts. Wal-Mart carts are too wide for the first two bags to sit on the top rail of the shopping cart. Sam's Club and more than likely Costco carts are too wide, also. Even my local H-E-B market carts are too wide, also.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Tink

customer_reviews.title: New best friend
customer_reviews.text: My new best friend while grocery shopping. My favorite part how easy the bags are to hold to bring into the house. Less trips from the car to the house and no more plastic bags! I wish i has these when my kids were little.
customer_reviews.author: april Barnes

customer_reviews.title: People keep asking
customer_reviews.text: I got the Lotus Trolly for my wife. She was skeptical at best but took them to the market. When she arrived home she said she was treated like a shopping rock star. Everyone was asking where the got them, complimenting her on how cool they were, telling her how their bags were always breaking and falling over. At the checkout, they said "Oh you have those really cool bags. They are the only bags she uses and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: William Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Large and well-made...but prepare for a possible snafu
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a month or so now, and so far I really like them! They are extra large and sturdy, so it only takes a couple trips taking them into the house. The only issue is that you have to completely empty your cart before loading the bags into it. If your grocery store has employees that bag and load your items for you, this may pose a dilemma. You could get a new cart for them to load into, but even that is a bit of a hassle. Other than that small issue, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: amytrowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Best option for reusable shopping bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of having the bags, with plenty of room. I can get all my shopping for the week, all my bags are organized so when I get home, it's easy to put them away. We have to commute 40 miles to our grocery store, so the cooler bag is amazing. I also purchased the produce bags and I really love them. This was the best investment I have made this year. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Coryannd

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than any other bags (reusable or not)!
customer_reviews.text: These bags make a full shopping trip super easy, the larger bags can carry more weight than plastic or paper bags, and 4 bags is much easier to deal with than the 30ish plastic bags I used to come home with. I have other (smaller) reusable bags, but I never remember to bring them to the store. I don't have that problem with these! For some reason I never forget them, they're just fun to use! The baggers at my usual grocery store haven't had trouble since the first time I explained it, and when bagging myself it's much easier to do than messing with plastic. All around a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool Bags
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these bags fit and store. They fit to most carts and are easy to fill and unload. Also, Because the rods are removable, it’s easy to use one as a tote without the worry of knocking everything off of the shelf it you get too close lol Only complaint is that only the cold/ hot bag has a solid bottom. The other three have a mesh bottom and it drives me insane. So far it’s holding up okay but there are a few nicks from sharp edges and I’m sure they’ll get bigger over time. 😔 It also keeps the bags from standing on their own which is a bit inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love these when I don't forget them at home
customer_reviews.text: The best way to use these is to load them up into your cart AFTER going through the checkout. They have held up really well with the loads of groceries I have brought home. I've surprised myself with how much can fit and how much weight it can hold. The seams are very strong and the materials are top quality. These are an amazing alternative to grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cart bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. These bags fit carts found in grocery stores. The biggest disappointment was they do not fit the carts in Sam’s Club and Costco which are larger than grocery store carts. I feel that should have been stated in the description. If it was I totally missed the notice description and needs to be more prominent. Because of that I am disappointed in the usefulness of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Will fit any cart width!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. I’ve had issues with other bags that have short rods (21 inch - 23 inch) that don’t reach across the carts and fall in. These rods are 27 inches long. They fit across the carts of any store I shop in without sticking too far over the edges. They are solidly made and I’m sure will last a long time. Very pleased. I fully recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: John N Dyan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I use them shopping every time. The insulated bag is perfect especially for AZ summer heat, too. Baggers not used to them so it slowed down check out process for them because it appears there were too many bags to choose from. Anyway, I’ll continue using my Lotus Trolley bags as they are so easy to load in car and bring in the house. They are very pretty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is my “Hidden Jewels” for my routine job, grocery shopping
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags!! So far till yesterday, It looks like I’m the one of 2 moms who actually has about this “hidden jewel” levels of grocery bags and using at stores around my neighborhood!! It’s so neat although it’s a little bit too expensive. But if you are also the mom like me who’s always seen at grocery stores looks like living there and buying so many things for your family includes “always hungry teenagers” every 3-5 days, you will know it worth it’s $$$! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Fold away easily
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! They hold all my groceries and save me from having to use plastic bags. Love how they fit in my shopping cart for easy organization. I do wish thy did not have mesh bottoms, and the freezer bag could be bigger. Actually it would be nice if all the bags were insulated. Over all tho - love these bags.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Best I found anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many similar systems but this is the best- best looking - best colors- easiest to use and best equipped on the unseen inside!
customer_reviews.author: teachermom

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We got them for our weekly grocery shopping and they are perfect! There is still a bit of room on the side in the cart for milk, juice, potatoes etc. It also cut down significantly on the number of trips we did in the grocery store! These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: So efficient for self bagging and environment friendly
customer_reviews.text: My main grocery store is self-bagging, and this was a game changer. So easy to spread the bags over the cart and I’m done bagging in half the time. Love the efficiency and that it is environment friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to get more in a shopping cart.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this being used by other shoppers - I did a gig-based shopping job. It helps me put more items in the cart and more efficiently segment when I'm shopping for one then one customer. I also like that I can lift them and put them right into the car.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Bregman

customer_reviews.title: Great even for regular shopping
customer_reviews.text: I use these every time I go food shopping. I’ve even started bringing some with me to places like target. I love reusable bags, but sometimes I forget to bring them and these bags have really made a difference in my shopping. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these amazing bags for a week now, and I am so pleased with them! 10/10 for satisfaction with my purchase! I initially bought them to do my Shipt orders. I do multiple orders with Shipt, and keep them separated by colored bag. Now, I use them for all my personal shopping too. They are the BEST!! I do wish that they came with a strap or something to keep them in a roll better when I’m not using them. I definitely would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and super handy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I could grocery shop again without using these bags. Saves having to use plastic bags and make multiple trips from the car. Super big and sturdy. Quality made product. Love them. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Used once so far and love it
customer_reviews.text: Was really nice and easy placing them in the cart after I unloaded everything on the conveyor belt. After scanning, they went right into the reusable trolley bags :-) Excited to use these again! I will say, they hold quite a bit! So if you can't lift very heavy loads, you may want to place the smaller bags first to fill those up and keep the weight down.
customer_reviews.author: meech1k

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit Aldi carts
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited to get these because I am a Aldi shopper ,. When they arrived they look exactly like the pictures. They fold easily and are sturdy . But they do Not fit in the cart easily , they didn’t open and spread for the quick check out at Aldi. They didn’t fit the cart :( I returned them as I didn’t need more bags .
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for Lidl!
customer_reviews.text: These bags save me so much time at Lidl. I love the colors, sizes, and durability. The only thing I would change is adding some way to remember the order they're supposed to go in. 9 times out of ten I just shove them in the car because I can't remember which way the velcros line up. Maybe add some arrows with numbers to help figure out which way they need to go in the buggy and how to fold 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: A must have for grocery shopping!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooo useful and cool. Won’t shop at the grocery store without them. Plus they even look pretty. Makes shopping a breeze! Love how they hang off the purse hook by the shopping cart handle until it is time to check out and put them to use. My mom and mother in law both bought them after I told them about them.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Wombat

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return and get a refund, not as described.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom who is environmentally conscience. She has not been able to use at any of her normal stores (Walmart, Target & Kroger as the rods are too short. She can use a single bag in the smaller carts which defeats the purpose & is inefficient. I feel like these are not as described, & we would like to return & get a refund. Please respond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: I tried these today, there wasn’t much to say about this. Seems sturdy and not sure how much weight it can hold but the bags are pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: JEN CON

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit all grocery carts!
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit all grocery carts, so it's not worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Theyve been a life saver since my state banned plastics. The insulated one is very true to its name.
customer_reviews.author: Illianna Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to open and place in the cart. Loading the groceries after check out was very efficient. The only difficult part was folding the bags after using them. It took a while to press the bags In order to use the Velcro closure.
customer_reviews.author: Anne727

customer_reviews.title: Makes grocery shopping so easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been grocery shopping all wrong, y'all! These are so awesome! Just tried mine for the first time and also the scan and bag app at my usual store. So easy!! Then I was able to carry them all inside in one trip!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bags!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and ease when bagging at checkout. Fits on buggy perfect. Get stopped and asked about the bags all the time. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: The hardest thing about this product
customer_reviews.text: Remembering to bring them in the store with you! I can't tell you how many times I took the long walk back to my car. But, THEY ARE WORTH IT. I bag myself, so I semi separate the goods, easy loading and unloading. Not having the plastic bags is WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Gehbauer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! They have made grocery shopping less stressful. I feel better not using all those plastic bags, they fit so much, and they handle heavy stuff like a champ. We have to go down stairs to get to our apartment and these make it so much easier! (The cooler bag is awesome too for ice cream and other frozen stuff!)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Useless and won't stay on cart
customer_reviews.text: About as useful as a poopy flavored lollipop.... the bags would not stay on the standard cart the bags would not fill fully and I had space on the side. I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: All in all a fair purchase
customer_reviews.text: They do fit across a Walmart shopping cart. The bags have to come out of the cart to have the cashier load them. If you plan on putting the groceries in yourself you will need to be quick to keep up with the cashier ringing and handing you items. They are attractive and I use them for my monthly large shopping but too much trouble for running to the store for a few items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I had been wanting these forever. Finally treated myself and after two uses, the stitching is starting to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Holds up very well!
customer_reviews.text: I took these bags to Sams Club, and as you know everything is in bulk. Since this was my first outing with these bags, I filled them to capacity to see what they could do. In one bag I had 4 cases of canned goods. Held up like a champ! No seams ripping or anything. I absolutely love them and keep them in my trunk at all times. Outstanding product!👏🏾👏🏾
customer_reviews.author: Kena J

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out I was putting them in the cart backwards :) , they are fantastic. They hold all the groceries during my weekly family shopping and make packing up those groceries at the checkout, a breeze. During the mid-week supplemental shopping, I just bring in one or two of them and it's perfect. I highly recommend these bags for convenience and, especially to stop the use of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: macownr

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: these bags are awesome. They fold up nicely and don't take up a ton of room in my trunk. Easy to carry. Easy to use. Makes shopping a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Holt

customer_reviews.title: The various sizes of these trolley bags is most convenient ...
customer_reviews.text: The various sizes of these trolley bags is most convenient when purchasing both large and small items at the market. The ability to hook the bags on the side of the cart for stability, also makes it easier to organize the products when packing them not having to simultaneously hold the bags open. It also enhances your shopping experience when using a hand held scanner, allowing you to scan the products as you place them in the bag for quick check-out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Grocery Runs
customer_reviews.text: My Husband got this for me and at first I scoffed at it. I took this for my Walmart grocery run and I knew I’d be buying a lot of items. I Loved this little contraption. I am all about banging my own groceries and bringing my own bags. This made my check out so fast and loading the car even easier! Very Happy with this item! GAMECHANGER
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lessening my carbon footprint more and more!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long for me to fall in love with these bags. I have been on the search for quality reusable bags and I found them. They are easy to carry, fold and make my shopping trips so much easier. I am tempted to purchase another set so I can get rid of ALL my so called "reusable" bags.
customer_reviews.author: P.R. Spates

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Hold up great- def need Costco size ones-regular too small floor carts but can still use loose- "Seller" would love a coupon for other size- to be an over $50 investment so far.. I bought the produce bags too
customer_reviews.author: Azacme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing reusable bags!
customer_reviews.text: Our town is shifting toward plastic bag free. I notoriously forget my bags at home. Or never bring enough. These roll up and take up little space! So they fit in the trunk of a car with ease! They are are great at the store, because you can sort your groceries as you go! Bagging is a breeze with these bags latched on to the cart. So much quicker putting up groceries when you have them sorted in advance (we have a big family so lots of groceries needed!). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Owl Family

customer_reviews.title: The dowels stick too far out
customer_reviews.text: The dowels stick too far out of the narrow end of the cart. I bought a different brand that clips to the side of the cart rather than using dowels to hold it up
customer_reviews.author: Itzkie

customer_reviews.title: Theses bags are a good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Clever solution to those awful single use bags. Every time, and I mean every time I use them someone asks me about them, even the checkers. One employee mentioned these were his favorite to work with. I’m still in a learning curve with them as far as loading, weight per bag etc., but I think these will do nicely. City council recently banned single use bags (about time) and that deadline is approaching. I would say these are well worth the money, seem sturdy and well made with care.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! So easy to go to the store! Drop the bags in the carriage, scan the groceries, and bag as I go. These bags are great and fit in the carriage perfectly. Easy to transfer full bags from carriage to car to house is easy. Also easy to fold up and store in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Life savers! Thick, quality material. Makes my life so much easier while grocery shopping. I ALWAYS get compliments at the grocery store about these bags. Everyone wants to know where I got them and what their called. So easy to stay organize while shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: These bags really come in handy when I am shopping at a bag it yourself store. However, most of my shopping is done at stores where the checker or bagger is doing the bagging. The poles that hold the bags make it really awkward if there is only a checker since I can’t really hand the bags over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: LynnieLynn77

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our local grocer will soon be doing away with plastic bags so I was looking for an alternative. Did a lot of research and finally ordered these. Can't say enough good things about them and people keep asking me when I'm shopping about them. They are sturdy, easy to use, easily keeps everything organized and so simple to only carry in 4 shopping bags. My 14 year old loves that feature!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Burkey-kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic invention. Fits perfect in the cart. Easy to store. Easy to carry groceries in. Every body in the store comments on how awesome they are!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to minimize plastic bag use. It worked very well. The wooden dowels that sit on top of the cart are strong unlike the cheap plastic hooks that come with some cart bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms of all but the insulated bag are made of mesh. This does not appear to be very durable and will probably tear easily. For the price of these should be better made. Could have bought more durable bags at the grocery store for less money.
customer_reviews.author: chynas grammy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to put a lot of heavy items in one bag, tough to lift
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fabulous! They fit perfectly in a standard shopping cart and hold a great deal of items. Even the supermarket manager was impressed and asked where we got them. They stay open to load and separated easily to place in car. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M Normandeau

product_meta.title: Lotus Trolley Bags -set of 4 -w/LRG COOLER Bag & Egg/Wine holder! Reusable Grocery Cart Bags sized for USA. Eco-friendly 4-Bag Grocery Tote. (Purple, Turquoise, Blue, Brown,)
feature_bullets: HEAVY-DUTY, HIGH CAPACITY REUSABLE GROCERY BAGS - Our patented design is made with 120 gsm fabric that is double stitched for strength, that has been tested to hold over 50 pounds in each bag, and has a mesh bottom that ensures spills don't pool in the bottom of the bag. This set is designed to fit average-sized shopping cart or trolley including at Kroger, Vons, Ralphs, Publix, Walmart & Whole Foods.

MACHINE WASHABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY: Being washable is a must for any grocery bags. Your Lotus Trolley Bag is Machine Washable! Simply remove the rods, and wash on cold gentle. Hang to dry. For the cooler bag, just wipe down to disinfect; do not put in machine. If you are looking for COSTCO, SAMS, TARGET or ALDI check out our WIDE Club Cart Version for the perfect fit.

MULTI-PURPOSE BAG - These bags, including our insulated cooler bag, are not just for grocery shopping. Each bag is detachable and the poles are removable so you can use them at the beach, for road trips, picnics and more. Don’t settle for knockoffs that don't have our patented removable rod design. You'll never run out of uses for your reusable trolley bags. ON SALE NOW. Buy while quantities last.

LIGHTWEIGHT, COMPACT AND FOLDABLE - Our shopping cart bags have long handles that you can carry on your shoulder, have a wide opening to make them easy to use and designed to fold for easy storage with an included strap that will keep them neat. They are machine washable and meant to be used hundreds of times.

A GREAT GIFT - This is A GREAT GIFT for your mom, wife or anyone in your family. And we are a “1% For The Planet” member so you will be supporting a great charity with your purchase. We offer a 100% Love it or leave it MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE.
